dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So this dark money group, Americans for Job Security, just had to disclose its donors for the first time since Citizens United.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So this dark money group, Americans for Job Security, just had to disclose its donors for the first time since Citizens United.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This is the first time in the Citizens United-era that a dark money group was forced to disclose their donors in a certain time period, said Jordan Libowitz, a spokesperson for nonprofit watchdog group Citizens for Responsibility and Ethics in Washington, referring to the 2010 Supreme Court case that wiped away previous restrictions on political spending.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it's a huge deal—CREW, that watchdog group, actually got the FEC to force their hand after years of legal battles.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it's a huge deal-C R E W, that watchdog group, actually got the F E C to force their hand after years of legal battles.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: But after years of litigation, CREW convinced the Federal Election Commission otherwise.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and the list they filed covers 2010 to 2012. Some massive names on there, like Charles Schwab donating nearly $9 million in just three months.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and the list they filed covers twenty ten to twenty twelve. Some massive names on there, like Charles Schwab donating nearly nine dollars million in just three months.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: AJS filed a list of its backers and beneficiaries from 2010 to 2012 on Thursday. Over the span of three months in 2012, he donated nearly $9 million.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Nine million? That's… staggering. And the Fisher family from Gap threw in another $9 million too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nine million? That's... staggering. And the Fisher family from Gap threw in another nine dollars million too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Gap cofounder Doris Fisheralong with her sons Robert, John and Williamgave another $9 million.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And it's not just them—billionaires from all over. Richard and Helen DeVos gave a million back in 2011.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it's not just them-billionaires from all over. Richard and Helen DeVos gave a million back in twenty eleven.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The late Republican megadonors Richard and Helen DeVos gave $1 million to the group in October 2012.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, and the WWE's Vince McMahon and his wife Linda, who later joined Trump's cabinet, they're on the list too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, and the W W E's Vince McMahon and his wife Linda, who later joined Trump's cabinet, they're on the list too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: WWE chief executive Vince McMahon donated, along with his wife Linda McMahon, who Donald Trump later appointed to his cabinet.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Even companies like Wynn Resorts and Bass Pro Shops made contributions—half a million from Wynn, fifty thousand from Bass Pro.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Even companies like Wynn Resorts and Bass Pro Shops made contributions-half a million from Wynn, fifty thousand from Bass Pro.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Wynn Resorts contributed $500,000 and Bass Pro Shops contributed $50,000 in 2012.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's wild how many of these names were hidden for so long. AJS always claimed they weren't political, so this disclosure is a big shift.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's wild how many of these names were hidden for so long. A J S always claimed they weren't political, so this disclosure is a big shift.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Americans for Job Security had previously claimed it was not a political organization and therefore did not have to disclose its donors.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And according to their president, Stephen DeMaura, this list came from bank records and spreadsheets—maybe even some duplicates in there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And according to their president, Stephen DeMaura, this list came from bank records and spreadsheets-maybe even some duplicates in there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In a letter to the FEC, AJS president Stephen DeMaura said the list was pulled from bank records, spreadsheets and other records, noting that it probably included some duplicates.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Still, it's a rare peek behind the curtain of dark money. Makes you wonder how many other groups are out there operating in the shadows.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still, it's a rare peek behind the curtain of dark money. Makes you wonder how many other groups are out there operating in the shadows.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And with donors like these, the scale of undisclosed influence… it's pretty concerning.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And with donors like these, the scale of undisclosed influence... it's pretty concerning.
